alert.note: Alert for Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 8:53PM CDT until May 29 at 10:25AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Arkansas River at Arkansas City affecting Cowley County. For the Arkansas River...including Great Bend, Hutchinson, Haven, Derby, Mulvane, Oxford, Arkansas City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River at Arkansas City. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The Water Plant takes precautions on water well pump houses west of the Arkansas River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.7 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Arkansas River Arkansas City 11.0 11.8 Thu 8 pm CDT 12.6 11.4 8.7 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
